flat.label: Flat
flat.info: This strategy bets the same wager and cashout threshold every time.

martingale.label: Martingale
martingale.info: This strategy bets the given wager and cashout threshold until a loss, in which case the wager is doubled for the next bet, this continues until a win in which case the wager is reset to the original amount.

revmartingale.label: Reverse Martingale
revmartingale.info: This strategy doubles the given wager and cashout threshold every time until a loss, in which case the wager is reset to the original amount.

splitmartingale.label: Labouchère (Split)
splitmartingale.info: This strategy generates a list of specified size, containing a split of the target profit. For each round the wager is the sum of the first and last elements on the list (with fixed 2x cashout), if it's a win, the items are removed, if it's a loss, the lost amount is appended to the list.
